creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: small boat just R of center; black rocks at LRC with dotted trees colored with light brown and green; rolling rocky shore at UL with pine trees; rocks lightly washed with pink pigment; very faint wash of blue pigment across center for water; inscription URQ with two square relief stamps just to L of inscription
marks:
Inscription and Seals 

URQ: [ 暁懸　軽帆　佐貞吉 ]
medium: Ink and light colors on mica paper
title: Light Sails in the Dawn
